script:
;;-----------------------------------------
# script "lisp"
# background "ancient_back"
# bgm "bgm036" 0
;;-----------------------------------------
;;ラブリュス
# body 200331
# pos 200331 3
# scale 200331 0.8 0
# alpha 200331 0 0
# mask 200331 off
# body 200335
# pos 200335 5
# scale 200335 0.8 0
# alpha 200335 0 0
# mask 200335 off
;;八咫鏡
# body 500321
# pos 500321 3
# scale 500321 0.8 0
# alpha 500321 0 0
# mask 500321 off
# body 500325
# pos 500325 1
# scale 500325 0.8 0
# alpha 500325 0 0
# mask 500325 off
;;CC芭蕉扇
# body 3500811
# pos 3500811 3
# scale 3500811 0.8 0
# alpha 3500811 0 0
# mask 3500811 off
;;CCシェキナー
# body 3400713
# pos 3400713 3
# scale 3400713 0.8 0
# alpha 3400713 0 0
# mask 3400713 off
;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
ラブリュス
[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 200331 0 0
# alpha 200335 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 200335 2 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 2003 "loveryus_unit_0008"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 200335 1 0
# move 200335 3 0
# scale 200335 0.8 0
# envbody 1001 11 0
# effectpattern 1001 2 0
# effectstart 1001
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 2003 "loveryus_kyara_0020"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@ラブリュス
もっとも～っと強く可愛く♪
なっちゃうよ～！

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# effectskip 1001
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# alpha 200335 0 0
# background "ancient_back"
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
八咫鏡
[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 500321 0 0
# alpha 500325 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 500325 4 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_kyara_0020"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 500325 1 0
# move 500325 3 0
# scale 500325 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_kyara_0016"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@八咫鏡
わらわが
お主を照らしてやるのじゃ…
ゆくぞ！

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 500325 0 0
# waitandnext 0.2

# fadein "black" 0.3
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

# bgm "stop"
# se "SE_0619"
# fadeout "black" 1.5
# textsize 32
# waitandnext 2
# textalign "center"
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

# bgmfile "bgm266" "BgmLostRagnarokBattle001" 0
# se "SE_1051"
# fadein "black" 0.3
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
クラスチェンジ
可能ユニット
2体追加！

# se "SE_1504"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 3400713 1 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
@
シェキナー・聖鎖・ラファエル

# se "SE_1504"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 3400713 0 0
# alpha 3500811 1 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
@
芭蕉扇・D. plug・リリス

# move 3400713 4 0
# alpha 3400713 1 0
# mask 3400713 on
# move 3500811 2 0
# mask 3500811 on
# fadein "white" 0.5
# face 3400713 "angry"
# face 3500811 "angry"
# voice 340071 "shekina_t_0029"
# voice 350081 "bashosen_a_0029"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 28
@
期間限定ミッションで
クラスチェンジディスクをゲット！

# textalign "center"
@
詳細はお知らせをチェック！

# fadeout "black" 1.5
# waitandnext 1.5
# textalign "center"
@
詳細はお知らせをチェック！
